price: Isipo kuwa kwa wake zao, au iliyo wamiliki mikono yao ya kuume, basi hao hawalaumiwi
arabic: إِلَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَزۡوَٰجِهِمۡ أَوۡ مَا مَلَكَتۡ أَيۡمَٰنُهُمۡ فَإِنَّهُمۡ غَيۡرُ مَلُومِينَ
footnotes: Lakini kwa wake zao na masuria wao hawazihifadhi; kwa sababu hapo hawalaumiwi kuifuata tabia ya maumbile.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: illā ʿalā azwājihim aw mā malakat aymānuhum fa-innahum ghayru malūmīna
